definition: Shanbei, northern Shaanxi province, including Yulin 榆林 and Yan'an 延安, a Holy Land of Mao's revolution 革命聖地|革命圣地
abbr. for Shaanxi 陝西|陕西 province
north/(classical) to be defeated

sentences.english: The Folk Songs of Northern Shaanxi is the most representative artistic form ofthe Loess Culture.
sentences.chinese: 陝北民歌是黃土文化中最具代表性的藝術形式。

sentences.english: Jingbian County is one of the major corn producing areas in North Shaanxi .
sentences.chinese: 靖邊屬陝北玉米主產區之一。

sentences.english: But it used to be the most popular staple food for people in Northern Shaanxi.
sentences.chinese: 但是這個本土食物在過去是陝北人最家常的主食。

sentences.english: Article XIII Xi Xian New Area is jointed with Northern Shaanxi's energy base construction.
sentences.chinese: 第十三條西鹹新區與陝北能源基地建設對接。

sentences.english: North across the demilitarized zone and shan democratic People's Republic of Korea adjacent.
sentences.chinese: 在非軍事區和陝北朝鮮民主主義人民共和國相鄰。

sentences.english: Shaanbei Luochuan loess plateau is one of soil erosion districts which is mainly resulted from loess slump.
sentences.chinese: 陝北洛川黃土塬是水土流失嚴重的地區。

sentences.english: Typical main city mode was still plain-valley-city in northern Shaanxi's Loess Hill and Gully Area.
sentences.chinese: 川穀型城鎮仍然是陝北黃土丘陵溝壑區的主要類型。

sentences.english: Youfangzhuang area lies in the west of Northern Shanxi Slope, Ordos Basin.
sentences.chinese: 油坊莊地區位於鄂爾多斯盆地陝北斜坡西部。

sentences.english: Suide County sits in the hilly-gully areas in Northern Shaanxi.
sentences.chinese: 綏德縣位於陝北丘陵溝壑地區。

sentences.english: Research and development of Northern Shaanxi White Cashmere Goat Raising and Reproduction Techniques.
sentences.chinese: 制定陝北白絨山羊新品種全舍飼養殖技術規範及標準。

sentences.english: Waist Drum in northern Shaanxi have lots to talk of love talk.
sentences.chinese: 陝北的腰鼓有說不完的情話。

sentences.english: The vegetation of the Ordos Plateau is rare, but the species of grasshopper is higher than Shaanbei Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 鄂爾多斯高原植被稀少，蝗蟲物種卻較陝北高原豐富。

sentences.english: The Upper Triassic Yanchang Formation in the Fuxian area is totally a very low porosity and permeability sandstone reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，陝北富縣延長組總體爲特低孔滲砂岩儲層。

sentences.english: North Shaanxi was the Mecca of Chinese revolution?
sentences.chinese: 翻譯求助陝北是中國的革命聖地。

sentences.english: Now, in rural areas of northern Shaanxi, who would cut flowers, it is still respected by the whole village.
sentences.chinese: 而今陝北農村，誰會剪花，仍被全村人所敬重。

sentences.english: It was drafted at Shenchuanpao, Chiahsien County, northern Shensi.
sentences.chinese: 宣言是在陝北佳縣神泉堡起草的。
